about_the_game:
This is a demo version of [Random Core Defense] where you can test your strategy and luck.

The main game is up to 100 waves, and you can enjoy the demo version until the boss match of 5 waves.
detailed_description:

The main game is up to 100 waves, and you can enjoy the demo version until the boss match of 5 waves.
